author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL-STORM-FORCE WIND GUSTS OCCURRING ON BERMUDA AND NANTUCKET... ...SWIMMING AT MOST U.S. EAST COAST BEACHES IS LIKELY TO REMAIN DANGEROUS FOR A COUPLE MORE DAYS...
summary: ...TROPICAL-STORM-FORCE WIND GUSTS OCCURRING ON BERMUDA AND NANTUCKET... ...SWIMMING AT MOST U.S. EAST COAST BEACHES IS LIKELY TO REMAIN DANGEROUS FOR A COUPLE MORE DAYS... As of 2:00 AM AST Fri Aug 22 the center of Erin was located near 37.9, -66.6 with movement NE at 22 mph. The minimum central pressure was 954 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL-STORM-FORCE WIND GUSTS OCCURRING ON BERMUDA AND NANTUCKET... ...SWIMMING AT MOST U.S. EAST COAST BEACHES IS LIKELY TO REMAIN DANGEROUS FOR A COUPLE MORE DAYS... As of 2:00 AM AST Fri Aug 22 the center of Erin was located near 37.9, -66.6 with movement NE at 22 mph. The minimum central pressure was 954 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
